settings.text: Free insured shipping for all orders
In stock - processed within 1-3 working days

settings.title: Shipping & Return
settings.content:
• Free Shipping for all orders above 50$
  • The order will be dispatched in 1-3 working days
  • The delivery time to Australia-wide is 5-10 days.
  • Tracking numbers provided after the item dispatched. So you could monitor the shipping status.
  • Hassle-free returns up to 30 days

settings.testimonial: AussieHilda presents clothing that just not everyone has. Each piece is very unique. I love the unconventional and bold design, which is what keeps me coming here to shop.
settings.author: Finnegan Smith

settings.testimonial: I found this brand on Facebook and was a bit skeptical at first as I had never heard of them before. I received my order quickly and in excellent condition. The clothing corresponds to the specified size, the fabric is good and the price is very reasonable.
settings.author: Cooper Davies

settings.testimonial: I had a question about sizing and customer service responded within minutes. Hilda went above and beyond to ensure I was happy with my purchase. You've secured yourself a lifelong customer!
settings.author: Lachlan Jones

settings.testimonial: Good fit, comfortable to wear, ideal for this cold season. Would love to comeback and see your latest collections.
settings.author: Riley Mitchell

settings.testimonial: What i love about AussieHilda is the value for money. I've got a coat that is less than $100, with quality that beyond my expectation. Thanks!
settings.author: Brody Harris

settings.subtitle: OUR VALUES
settings.title: Crafted with Love
settings.text:
As a family run business, we are extremely grateful for each of our customers.

If your experience with us is not positive for any reason, we will do everything to ensure you are satisfied with your purchase.

settings.title: 30 Days Return Guarantee
settings.text: We love our products and we are sure you will too! That's why we offer a 30-day risk-free trial period. If you don't love our product, get your money back. Read our return policy here.

settings.title: When will my order be shipped?
settings.text:
After your payment is confirmed, we will begin processing your order immediately. It typically takes 1-3 business days to process and ship your order.

Once your order has shipped, you will receive a shipping confirmation email with your tracking number so you are always informed of the whereabouts of your order. Depending on Location, shipping may take 5-10 business days from the shipping date.

settings.title: How can I track my order?
settings.text: Once your order has shipped, you will immediately receive a confirmation email containing a link to your personal tracking information so you can stay informed of your order's whereabouts at all times.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.text:
We proudly offer a 30 day money back guarantee. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, you can easily return unused items within 30 days of receipt.

Refunds will be made to your original form of payment once your items are returned have arrived in our warehouse in China. The shipping cost to return the items is on the customers.

settings.title: What if I have further questions?
settings.text:
We know that fashion is everything to do with self-expression and feeling comfortable in your own skin. That's why we're here to help you find the perfect outfit that suits your style and personality.

Our dedicated customer service team is always happy to chat. Whether you need help choosing sizes, styling tips, or just want to say hello, we're here for you! So please don't hesitate to contact us at cs@aussiehilda.com

settings.title: Still uncertain? We have the answer to your question.
